clean_door_surface.description: Clean the surface of the door to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_door.description: Wipe the door to ensure it is clean and dust-free.

push_drawer_to_close.description: Push the open drawer slide it back in to the closed position.

wipe_open_drawer.description: Wipe the interior of the opened drawer to clean it.

close_drawer.description: Slide in the opened drawer to close it.

pull_drawer_to_open.description: Pull the closed drawer out to open it for use.

wipe_closed_drawer.description: Wipe the exterior of the closed drawer.

open_drawer.description: Slide out the closed drawer to open it.

wipe_table_surface.description: Wipe the surface of the table to clean it.

clean_table.description: Clean the table surface to ensure it is neat and tidy.

clean_table_inside_out.description: Clean the entire table including all the doors, drawers, and the surface.

clean_whole_table.description: Clean the entire table including the door, body, and drawers.
